page.title: 08What we Play at School.
page.content: All the boys over seven years old play in the top playground and we have to be with all the little ones in the bottom playground and we cannot play fast games.Sometimes we play Hopscotch and have a small pitch chalked on the ground,sometimes Tip where we chase others,touch them so that they are 'on it'and have to chase,we skip a lot with two turning the rope and we skip in and out,but our favorite is 'Elastics'when two stretch the elastic between them,we jump in or out taking one side of the elastic loop over the other and undoing it. The boys play a lot of football,some Hide and Seek.They like playing British Bulldog when one starts standing in the middle,all others race from one end to the other,middle man catches if he can and shouts "British Bulldog,1,2,3!"and then those catch.
